companyDescription: 7-Eleven Malaysia Holdings Berhad is an investment holding company that has been listed on the Main Market of Bursa Malaysia Securities Berhad since 2014. Its main subsidiary, 7-Eleven Malaysia Sdn. Bhd., owns and operates 7-Eleven stores in Malaysia. The company is the pioneer and largest 24-hour standalone convenience store operator in Malaysia. 7-Eleven Malaysia Holdings Berhad also owns Caring Pharmacy, one of Malaysia’s largest retail pharmacy chains.

topShareholders.shareholderName: Tan Sri Dato’ Seri Vincent Tan Chee Yioun
